title: The Queen opens parliament
brief_description: This film describes the 1957 opening of Parliament in detail and explains the significance of each part of the ceremony as Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II, in her capacity as Canada’s constitutional monarch, convenes the twenty-third session of Parliament.
